kw.name: Create Webdriver
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click the menu in the home page
Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath://button[@class='MuiButtonBase-root MuiIconButton-root MuiIconButton-colorInherit MuiIconButton-edgeStart MuiIconButton-sizeMedium css-q6oun']'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click the about in the Menubar
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click the shrine element in the about
Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath://div[@class='MuiButtonBase-root MuiListItemButton-root MuiListItemButton-gutters MuiListItemButton-root MuiListItemButton-gutters css-6poya9'][3]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Verify agin it redirected into shine page
Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath://h4[@class='MuiTypography-root MuiTypography-h4 css-6ubyw9']' contains exact text 'SHINE PANEL'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
